description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Take on the role of a professional hacker who has finally released him/herself into the internet after many years of studying hacking. Fight your way through, avoiding viruses and worms - or even other hackers - along with breaking firewalls to reach your destination.
description.short: Take on the role of a professional hacker who has finally released him/herself into the internet after many years of studying hacking. Fight your way through, avoiding viruses and worms - or even other hackers - along with breaking firewalls to reach your destination.
